thread.title: Washington Nationals fire manager Matt Williams, coaching staff
thread.title_full: Washington Nationals fire manager Matt Williams, coaching staff

title: Washington Nationals fire manager Matt Williams, coaching staff
text:
Washington Nationals fire manager Matt Williams, coaching staff POSTED: 11:27 AM EDT Oct 05, 2015 UPDATED: 12:21 PM EDT Oct 05, 2015 Large Text MGN Online 
The Nationals say they have fired manager Matt Williams and his coaching staff after a season in which the team went from World Series favorite to failing to make the playoffs. More from WDBJ7.com Lloyd Lee Welch Jr. makes first appearance in Bedford Co. court for Lyon sisters case, trial date set 
Washington announced the move Monday, a day after the Nationals finished the regular season barely above .500 at 83-79, second to the New York Mets in the NL East. 
Williams was the manager in Washington for two seasons. Last year, he was voted NL Manager of the Year after the Nationals finished with the best record in the league. 
In February, the Nationals exercised his 2016 contract option.
